titleStmt.title: Strange nevves out of diuers countries neuer discouered till of late, by a strange pilgrime in those parts.
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Iones for George Fayerbeard, and are to be sold at his shop at the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed: B.N., i.e. Nicholas Breton.
Identified as STC 3704 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop at the Royall Exchange
